title: Mandates courses of study in internet safety in all public and private schools grades k thru 12
summary: Mandates courses of study in internet safety in all public and private schools grades k thru 12.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          956

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  COLTON,  ROBINSON,  BENEDETTO, GIGLIO, RAIA,
         JAFFEE, MAISEL, TITUS, CLARK, SPANO, PHEFFER -- Multi-Sponsored by  --
         M.  of  A.  CONTE,  CROUCH, McDONOUGH, MOLINARO, REILLY, WEISENBERG --
         read once and referred to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to courses  of  study  in
         internet safety

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivisions 1 and 2 of section 814 of the  education  law,
    2  as  added  by  chapter  526  of the laws of 2006, are amended to read as
    3  follows:
    4    1.  [Any] ALL school [district] DISTRICTS, PUBLIC AND PRIVATE, in  the
    5  state  [may]  SHALL  provide,  to  pupils in grades kindergarten through
    6  twelve, instruction designed to promote the proper and safe use  of  the
    7  internet.
    8    2.  The  commissioner  shall provide technical assistance to assist in
    9  the development of curricula for such courses of study  which  shall  be
   10  age  appropriate  and  developed according to the needs and abilities of
   11  pupils at successive grade levels in order to provide awareness, skills,
   12  information SECURITY, CYBER ETHICS and support to aid in the safe  usage
   13  of  the  internet.  SUCH  CURRICULA  SHALL BE UPDATED AS NEW THREATS ARE
   14  IDENTIFIED.
   15    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04969-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to courses of study in internet safety
